transcript.title: Address to the Centre for Independent Studies
transcript.content:
E&OE...

Australia Rising to the Education Challenge

Thank you very much Greg. I should start by, how shall I put it, calling you to account for not having finished reporting to the gathering the exchange we had about the Chaser. You did say it's your ABC and I said certainly not after last night's episode of Bastard Boys. But to Greg Lindsay and the Centre for Independent Studies, I want to thank you very warmly for offering me this opportunity to deliver the second in a series of speeches under the theme of
